title: Rapid Onset of Itch Relief With Tapinarof in Two Phase 3 Trials in Atopic Dermatitis.
abstract: In the ADORING 1 and 2 phase 3 trials, tapinarof cream 1% once daily (QD) demonstrated significant efficacy and was well tolerated in adults and children down to 2 years of age with atopic dermatitis (AD). Here we evaluate the time to onset of itch relief in the trials.
journal: Journal of drugs in dermatology : JDD
